title: plz help client keeps darkening  and cant click the play button

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: plz help really wanna play league before the holiday finishes

replies.body: it does not work sadly  it was already compatible and i did most of  the things you asked i just re installed with administration and it still pop up any more suggestions ?

Thanks for trying!  If the guide didn't help then submit a  [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to the ticket.  We'll get back to you!

This dimmed screen can sometimes be caused by permissions issues, but can also be resolved by running it in compatibility to Windows 7.  If toggling compatibility doesn't work, try the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help.  Let me know if you have any questions!
